mapper.select: select bizcategory,company_name,biz_contents,phone_number,employee_cnt,addr01,addr02,company_addr,homepage, to_char(establish_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as establish_date from ICTBIZINFO where bizcategory=#{bizcategory} and addr01=#{addr01} and addr02=#{addr02}

select * from (select bizcategory,company_name,biz_contents,phone_number,employee_cnt,addr01,addr02,company_addr, homepage, to_char(establish_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as establish_date, row_number() over(partition by bizcategory order by bizcategory) as rn from ICTBIZINFO) where rn <=1
